name: chatGPT4 SAC - dataLoom
description: A custom widget to integrate chatGPT4 Completions in SAC Analytic application

getCompletions.description: Wrapper for jQuery post to get completions from OpenAI's GPT model

parameters.name: APIKey
parameters.description: The OpenAI API key used for authentication.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The input text that GPT should complete.
